nodes.text: Welcome to TWC Classrooms! We inspire children and enthusiasts through Courses, Camps, and Events. What would you like to explore?

About TWC: TWC Classrooms is an initiative of Physer: The Wise Craze. We provide hands-on STEM learning in Robotics, Aeronautics, Electronics, Coding, Mathematics, and Science. Courses are for ages 4–20+; camps for ages 6–15. Visit: https://physer.in/twc
Courses: Our courses are practical and project-based. Which subject are you interested in?
Physics (Ages 4–20+): Build foundation with hands-on experiments covering mechanics, optics, electricity, and more. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#physics
Robotics (Ages 6–20+): Mechanical Robotics and Programmable Robotics. Projects include moving robots, line followers, and automation. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#robotics
Electronics: Learn components, circuits, sensors, and microcontroller projects. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#electronics
Coding & Programming: Start with block coding, Python, C++, and project-based software development. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#coding
Mathematics: Concept building from basics to advanced topics, problem solving, and competitions. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#maths
Science: Hands-on experiments in physics, chemistry, and biology to learn scientific methods. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#science
Logical Reasoning: Brain games, puzzles, and strategy exercises. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#logic
Computer Science: Practical knowledge of computer hardware, operating systems. Details: https://physer.in/twc/courses#cs
Events & Camps: Which event would you like details about?

Pawan Bodh — Aeronautics Camp (Online, 5 days): Dates: Oct 6–10, 2025. Ages: 6–15. Timings: Juniors 5:30–6:30 PM; Seniors 6:30–7:30 PM. Fee: ₹1500 per student. Register: https://physer.in/events/pawanbodh/page.html
Other Upcoming Events: Seasonal camps and workshops. Details: https://physer.in/events
Enrollment / Registration: What would you like to register for?
Course Registration: Visit courses page to choose a course and enroll online: https://physer.in/twc/courses
Camp Registration: Register for camps using the events registration form: https://physer.in/events/pawanbodh/page.html
Scholarships & Discounts: TWC offers group discounts and scholarships. Contact us: https://physer.in/connect-us/
Fees & Timings: What would you like to know?
Course Fees: Varies by course. See details: https://physer.in/twc/courses
Camp Fees: Example — Pawan Bodh: ₹1500 for 5 days (online). Details: https://physer.in/events/pawanbodh/page.html
Timings & Schedule: Courses have their own schedule. Pawan Bodh camp: Juniors 5:30–6:30 PM; Seniors 6:30–7:30 PM (Oct 6–10, 2025). Check pages for details.
Instructors & Expertise: Which instructor or area do you want to know about?
Sagar Verma: Expert in Physics and Robotics. He leads hands-on projects and guides students through mechanics and robotics design.
Aashutosh Pandey: Aeronautical Engineer with experience at HAL. He teaches aeronautics, flight principles, and model design.
Other Instructors: TWC brings instructors experienced in coding, electronics, math, and science. See instructor bios: https://physer.in/twc
Technical / Support: What do you need help with?
Online Class Access: Join online classes via the TWC platform. See instructions and links: https://physer.in/twc
Login / Signup Issues: Facing sign-in or registration problems? Contact support: https://physer.in/connect-us/
Platform / Website Help: Report website or platform bugs with page URL, browser/device, and a short description: https://physer.in/connect-us/
Other Technical Support: For device, camera, audio, or connectivity help, contact support: https://physer.in/connect-us/
Other Queries: Choose a topic or ask your own question.
Neurodiverse Support: TWC courses are inclusive and provide flexible pace and support. Discuss specific needs with our team: https://physer.in/connect-us/
Are classes online? Most courses and camps have online options. Some sessions may be offline; check course/event pages.
Contact TWC: Reach us via https://physer.in/connect-us for queries, callbacks, or mentor contact.
Hands-on Projects: Every course and camp includes practical projects — robots, circuits, models, experiments, and coding.
Certification: Courses provide completion certificates. Advanced assessments may be available — check course details.
Competitions & Events: TWC shares competition and event opportunities periodically. Details: https://physer.in/events
Please type your enquiry below and our team will get back to you soon. Include your name and contact details if you want a quicker reply.
